attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To have more control on waste pollution, people should be allowed only to throw away one rubbish bag or kitchen waste, which includes nappies and toilet tissue/waste per household. 
All of this with a council ref no. on bags to have more control.

Control on Business should be applied by assigning Environmental  Mng Syst/dep, in charge of minimizing waste that goes to landfill, creating green projects and educating the community.

Fines should be issued to the ones that do not follow guidelines.

Methane  Gas Should be more used as energy source as it is cheap/free and reduces kitchen/organic waste going to landfills.

Money giving away by government to campaigners, etc to convince people to recycle will be saved as a compulsory law will be changing the circumstances bringing more respect to this land regardless if people are British or not.

It will be an excellent opportunity for other countries to follow as it will contribute hugely to the economy of the country, create jobs, reduce health issues, minimise pollution and obviously improve climate change problem.

We appreciate your support as it will bring more positive things to everyone.
